content: ws turn k12 rs tween the first 2 stitches on the left hand needle finish thumb ws bind off 8 sts knit to end of row 30 and knit 1 stitch from this position leaving the sts first stitch on the left hand needle slip the new next row rs k30 sts k14 sts from holder 44 sts stitch to the left hand needle repeat until you have the desired number of stitches knit 8 row short row knit 28 sts ws turn k28 rs knit 10 row short row knit 28 sts ws turn k28 rs knit 8 row short row k36 sts ws turn k28 sts rs turn knit to end ws knit 4 row bind off all sts sew side seam sew thumb seam w j w a w m g ja a g g d ge e r e s i p n u r m n y a s a in p r e n u co n m www ja v g 5 is g © i w e t s r o a s u u t s p e r a u r n m n s m i y l t l i r l a l e s s r e t a n o t n r d c e s o j j p a m a g ri g g n e g g r r e e v s t r a p a l s u e i n l p @ m y u a n j e r a n s g 0 2 g t 4 0 a e 2 0 0 r 8 s y 3 h a r n com fro @ o m l n a j f f a o t j i o e g n r a l s g l s g a o t t e g l w a l n r e g t e s h r u r w p e a s s u s m p n u n
